title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Development in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic online learning functionalities and job-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Aimed at enhancing adaptability to online learning environments for managers/leaders within enterprises to strengthen social sector job competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can set specific learning goals in an online learning environment and develop a weekly action plan within six months.
Learners can periodically monitor and adjust their learning progress using self-regulated learning strategies by the third month.
Learners can quantitatively analyze learning outcomes through project-based assessment at the end of the course and write a self-evaluation report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
